text: Dakara moshi kare-ra ga, anata to ronso surunaraba ii nasai. `Watashi mo watashi ni shitagau mono mo, magokoro komete arra ni fukuju, kie shi tsukaemasu.' Mata keiten o æŽˆ Tte iru hitobito to muchi no mono-tachi ni ii nasai. `Anata gata wa fukuju, kie shita no ka.' Moshi fukuju, kie sureba, tashikani tadashiku michibika re, tatoe kare-ra ga somuki saru ni shite mo, anata no tsutome wa, tada (keiji o) kare-ra ni tsutaeru dakedearu. Hontoni arra wa shimo be-tachi o (morenaku) gozonji de ara reru
